mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Remind (account, title, description, cronExpression, beginTime, endTime, totalTimes, createTime) VALUES (#{account}, #{title}, #{description}, #{cronExpression}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{totalTimes}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE Remind SET account = #{account}, title = #{title}, description = #{description}, cronExpression = #{cronExpression}, beginTime = #{beginTime}, endTime = #{endTime}, totalTimes = #{totalTimes} WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: UPDATE Remind SET isDeleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Remind WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM Remind WHERE account = #{account} AND isDeleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE Remind SET remindedTimes = remindedTimes + 1 WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
